nodes.text: Topatoes were vegetables eaten, baked and creamed. Topato soup could be added with pasta forms to make Aurebesh soup. Before his restaurant's destruction in 19 BBY, Dexter Jettster used slices of topato in his Coruscant slider, a dish inspired by his time on the planet of Coruscant.
"Topato" is an anagram of the real root vegetable potato.
